data.name: Alice
data.text: 大草，时间复杂度O(n)的排序算法来辣！

data.name: Bob
data.text: 线程之间不是完全synchronized的，这样元素一多要出事的

data.name: Carol
data.text:
```python
import random
def 🐒_sort(lst):
    while any(i>j for i,j in zip(lst[:-1], lst[1:])):
        lst = random.shuffle(lst)
    return lst
```

data.name: Dave
data.text: Re : wakaka，树洞越来越好玩了

post.text:
```python
import _thread
from time import sleep
import numpy as np
 
items = [2, 4, 10, 2, 1, 7]
# 求平均值
m = np.mean(items)
# 求数字位数
length = len(str(m).split('.')[0])
# 计算等待时间的比例
p = np.power(0.1, length -1)
 
# 睡眠排序算法
def sleep_sort(i):
    sleep(i * p)
    print(i)
```
